about.intro_sentence: Software is an artistic expression of human's logic.

intro_paragraph.1: Hi there! I'm Diego Ospina, a Software Engineer passionate about building end-to-end systems.
intro_paragraph.2: I strongly believe in the statement that opens this self-description, therefore my work reflects software with identity that offers a comforting user experience.

intro_end.base: Every development carries a trace of

ecotrack.title: Ecotrack
ecotrack.description: Full-stack mobile app that helps companies reduce their carbon footprint by motivating employees to complete simple eco-oriented tasks and lessons.

aqua.title: Aqua
aqua.description: Web application for monitoring a company's production line with functionalities for recording and visualizing metrics and indicators.

medical_scheduling.title: Medical appointment scheduling
medical_scheduling.description: REST API for appointment scheduling in a medical center with complex business rules, authentication and authorization.
